title: Problem when notarizing software which uses SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz
body:
I am using [SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz](https://www.nuget.org/packages/SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz/2.88.2) in my application for some graphics related work. I planned to [notarizing](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/security/notarizing_macos_software_before_distribution) the setup and taking setup on a new macOS Monterey machine to avoid any issues with malicious software.. But facing some errors from .dylib file. 


**Error details:**

"issues": [
   {
     "**severity**": "error",
     "**code**": null,
     "**path**": "Samples/bin/Debug/net6.0/runtimes/osx/native/libHarfBuzzSharp.dylib",
     "**message**": "The binary is not signed with a valid Developer ID certificate.",
     "**docUrl**": https://developer.apple.com/documentation/security/notarizing_macos_software_before_distribution/resolving_common_notarization_issues#3087721,
     "**architecture**": "x86_64"
   },
   {
     "**severity**": "error",
     "**code**": null,
     "**path**": " /Samples/bin/Debug/net6.0/runtimes/osx/native/libHarfBuzzSharp.dylib",
     "**message**": "The signature does not include a secure timestamp.",
     "**docUrl**": https://developer.apple.com/documentation/security/notarizing_macos_software_before_distribution/resolving_common_notarization_issues#3087733,
     "**architecture**": "x86_64"
   },


Any idea or suggestion to handle this?
